article-description: To create your own website, follow these steps:
banner-description: All of the tools you need to build and grow your business online, centralized on a simple platform.
brand-title: Manage your website design with one click
brand-description: Want to change your fonts, color palette or style of button? Make the change with one click and apply it to the entire website using HostCreator tool.
brand-back-btn: Click the icons below to see how it works:
clients-title: We love our clients, and they love us back!
createblog-title: Create a blog and share your voice in minutes
createblog-description: Create a free blog to share your ideas and grow your audience. Set up your blog with a designer-made template and enjoy all the built-in features.
dbstudio-description: Answer detailed questions about your brand identity and personal style and our online Logo Maker will create a design that’s right for you.
ArticleData-description: Pick a template and customize anything, or answer a few questions and get a free website designed.
ArticleData-description1: Answer a few questions about your website, location and keywords and get a personalized SEO plan.
ArticleData-description2: Check out the mobile-optimized version of your site. Switch to the Mobile Editor to personalize more.
ArticleData-description3: Show up to the right people at the right time! Drive traffic to your website.
OnlineStoreData-description1: Bring your brand to life with customizable, responsive themes.
OnlineStoreData-description2: Create your store without coding or design skills.
OnlineStoreData-description3: Bring your own domain or purchase one through HostShop.
DbStudioData-description1: Add the name of your brand, business or organization, plus a tagline if you have one.
DbStudioData-title2: Tell Us What Your Logo Is For
DbStudioData-description2: Select your business industry, so the Logo Maker can understand your brand’s needs.
DbStudioData-description3: Choose from different style options so we can tailor a personalised logo to your brand.
DbStudioData-description4: Get high-quality image files and use your custom logo design everywhere.

ClientsData-desc: It takes me about 10 days to create a cool application. App making is my main job and I can support my family with it. In my opinion HostCreator is the best, for so many reasons I like this platform!

App-Builder-Anything: Anything is possible with the right app builder
App-Builder-Article-desc: Use a rich set of fully-customizable widgets to build native interfaces in minutes.
App-Builder-Article-desc1: Quickly ship features with  focus on native end-user experiences. Expressive and Flexible UI.
App-Builder-Article-desc2: Check out the mobile-optimized version of your site. Switch to the Mobile Editor to personalize more.
App-Builder-Article-desc3: HostCreator code is compiled to native ARM machine code using Dart's native compilers.
App-Builder-Anything-desc: Choose one of the ready-made professional templates or start with a clean slate.
App-Builder-Anything-desc1: Ready-made components and widgets will help in expanding the functionality of the mobile app.
App-Builder-Anything-desc2: Upload your app to the App Store and Google Play.
App-Builder-Banner-desc: It's a fact, you really need to own a mobile application. You can look for someone to develop it for you or just create it yourselfwith HostCreator for free.
App-Builder-FastDevelopment-desc: HostCreator helps you quickly and easily experiment, build UIs, add features, and fix bugs faster. Experience sub-second reload times without losing state on emulators, simulators, and hardware.
App-Builder-HavingAnApp-title: Having an app is now possible for everyone
App-Builder-HavingAnApp-desc: For businesses, there is no better way to be constantly present and within close reach. Get started today with your very own app and offer your customers a completely new and impressive platform for your services and products.
Portfolio-Banner-title: Showcase your work  with a portfolio
Portfolio-Banner-desc: Design a unique portfolio and stand out online with our professional tools. Get your work noticed, increase your visibility on the web and start earning.
Portfolio-CreatePortfolio-title: Create a portfolio that stands out
Portfolio-CreatePortfolio-desc: Choose from a variety of unique layouts to find the one that best displays your work. Add individual projects to keep your website organized and easy-to-navigate.
Portfolio-GetBeautiful-desc: Online portfolios are all about . That's why we create designer portfolios that make an impact. Plus easy slide shows, lots of storage, and a media library right at your fingertips.
Websites-Banner-desc: HostCreator has everything you need to create a unique, beautiful and modern website that will help you stand out and achieve your goals.
Websites-BringIdeas-desc: Edit your images and text the way you want. Choose a font style you like and access thousands of free photos. All templates are responsive. This means your website will adapt to look great on different devices.
Websites-DragAndDrop-title: Drag and drop to build, click to get online.
Websites-DragAndDrop-desc: Our free website builder lets you add hundreds of features, like an online store, contact forms, online booking and social media buttons. Engage visitors with thousands of royalty free images from our library.
Websites-GetYourWebsite-desc: Design and build your own high-quality websites. Whether you’re promoting your business, showcasing your work, opening your store or starting a blog—you can do it all with the HostCreator website builder for free.
Websites-MoreThan-title: More than just a website creator
Websites-MoreThan-desc: HostCreator supports all payment gateways that your website supports, integrate any payment gateway and accept payments globally.
Websites-SetYourself-desc: HostCreator empowers you to bring your ideas to life. With our all-inclusive web builder you can design, manage and grow your online presence—all from one powerful platform.
Websites-WebsiteData-1: Pick a template that's right for your industry or idea. This is the basis for your website.
Websites-WebsiteData-3: Get everything just how you like it. Customise the template, add text and images.
Websites-WebsiteData-5: Finished? Hit Publish and your site will be online on your own domain (web address)
Websites-WebsiteData-7: Don't promote someone else's brand with your emails. Choose professional communication.
Websites-WebsiteData-9: Your domain is free for the first year. We'll also throw in an SSL certificate.
Websites-WebsiteData-11: No matter what device your visitors are using, your website will display perfectly.
